entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
